benchmark_details.name: Count Love Protest Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The dataset documents 42,347 protest events reported in local news sources in the United States between January 2017 and January 2021, including metadata such as dates, locations, crowd size estimates, and descriptive tags.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide structured data for understanding temporal and geographic trends in protest events reported in news articles.

data.source: Manual labeling and semi-automated crawling of news articles from 3,410 news sources in the United States.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on predictions of the classifier compared to manually labeled data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision and recall indicate better performance in identifying protest events from news articles.
methodology.validation: Dataset split into training (70%), validation (15%), and testing (15%) sets.
